meanings.sent1: The petters at the shelter are very gentle with the cats and dogs.
meanings.sent2: We saw a group of petters feeding and playing with the animals at the zoo.
meanings.sent3: The petters giggled as the puppy licked their faces.
meanings.sent4: She was known as the queen of petters, always surrounded by purring cats.
meanings.sent5: The children loved watching the petters care for the injured bird.

meanings.definition: Those who engage in the act of petting animals.
meanings.sent1: The petters in the park were enjoying the company of the friendly squirrels.
meanings.sent2: Many petters visit the farm to spend time with the cows and horses.
meanings.sent3: The petters laughed as the goats nibbled on their shoelaces.
meanings.sent4: The petters' hands moved in a soothing rhythm as they stroked the rabbits' fur.
meanings.sent5: The petters always carry treats to reward the well-behaved pets.
